sentences.english: Studies of blue honeysuckle(Lonicera caerulea L. ) were briefly reviewed.

sentences.english: Lonicera edulis is the plant of Caprifoliaceae.
The wild Lonicera caerulea fruits are abundant as a natural resource, has the very strong nutrition health care value.

sentences.english: He slipped into an indigo tank.

sentences.english: This text studied the adsorption and separating of the red pigment from Lonicera edulis Turcz with macroporous resin.
sentences.chinese: 對大孔樹脂吸附分離藍靛果紅色素的條件進行研究。

sentences.english: It is of great importance during male Yao People's growth stages.

sentences.english: Dry land rice growing is the primary production activities of Landian Yaos high land shifting farming.

sentences.english: The present invention relates to a food or drug which is prepared by the composition of lonicera caerulea var. edulis and isoflavones with the calcium compatibility.

sentences.english: Red, orange, yellow, green, blue, indigo, purple. Oh, the sun has seven colours.
